Unfortunately the weapons systems were prohibitively expensive and notoriously difficult to manufacture, resulting in a lengthy lead-time to deployment. The first Defender units saw action shortly after the beginning of Space War I but only in limited numbers. Forty units were manufactured aboard the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] and served throughout the war along side other destroid units. Though the Defender was a capable mecha, as a defensive unit in constant front line engagements, these destroids suffered heavy losses during the war. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/destroid-defender.htm

character.name: Quiltra-Quelamitz
character.description: A potent warship, the Quiltra-Quelamitz class vessel is an often forgotten but significant part of the Zentradi fleets. Though the craft is somewhat small by the standards of most Zentradi ships of the line, it possesses one of the most devastating weapons of the fleet. The forward half of the craft is dominated by the main gun, a heavy converging energy beam cannon. The bow splits in half vertically, collimating the energy of the blast just prior to release. The main gun can blast through the most heavily armored hypercarbon hulls of enemy spacecraft and can rain high-energy mass destruction down upon a planetary body. With it`s powerful primary weapon, the Quiltra-Quelamitz is the backbone of any large-scale fleet-to-fleet engagement and a necessary tool for operations requiring effective planetary bombardment. Though primarily an anti-ship/anti-fortifications vessel, the Quiltra-Quelamitz does feature many conventional cannon emplacements upon its hull and carries a modest complement of Nousjadeul-Ger powered armor suits for anti-mecha attack and defense.Aside from its role in the destruction of planet Earth on February 2010, the most notable operation involving a Quiltra-Quelamitz class ship was during the Defensive Battle of Macross City in January 2012. Zentradi warlord http://anidb.net/ch10516 [Quamzin Kravshera] commanded a Quiltra-Quelamitz in his failed attempt to destroy the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross]. During the battle, the main cannon of the Quiltra-Quelamitz inflicted fatal damage on the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] with a single shot, penetrating the hull and destroying the ship`s main reactors. Though the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [Macross] was able to briefly return fire via auxiliary power, the Quiltra-Quelamitz was able to remain aloft after a direct hit from the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [Macross] super-dimension-energy cannon. The Quiltra-Quelamitz then rammed the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [Macross] in a suicide run, but only succeeded in severing the starboard arm and docked http://anidb.net/ch48825 [SLV-111 Daedalus] carrier from the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1] before crashing to the ground just beyond the shore of Lake Macross.Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/quiltra-quelamitz.htm

character.name: Vrlitwhai 7018
character.description: Vrlitwhai appeared in the movie http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a Zentradi commander who also becomes a defector to the human side. However, he appeared bald with a modified uniform and face plate, and his name was changed to Vrlitwhai 7018 in the film credits. Source: wiki

character.name: Exsedol 4970
character.description: Exsedol appeared in the movie http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?], also as a Zentradi advisor who becomes a defector to the human side. However, his appearance was radically redesigned, with a bald, swollen head, green skin, a cloak covering his body, and retractable tendrils for arms. This design was carried over to his subsequent appearance in the TV series http://anidb.net/a442 [Macross 7], with some slight differences, namely that he has a blue collar, green tendrils, and a slightly darker skin tone. Exsedol in http://anidb.net/a442 [Macross 7] is also rarely seen without a hemispherical cap on his cranium, usually connected to the ceiling. Source: wiki

character.name: Queadluun-Rau
character.description: Already largely organic in appearance, the film version of the Queadluun-Rau underwent only a subtle redsign from the television series. The most notable difference was the change in colors, utlizing the Meltrandi magenta fleet colors for the standard version while http://anidb.net/ch10517 [Milia]`s unit was colored red (perhaps a subtle historical allegory to Manfred von Richthofen, the Red Baron of World War I). Aside from the different colors and slight stylistic changes, the Queadluun-Rau was just as deadly in the movie. Following the Great Interstellar War (Space War I), the Queadluun-Rau units were employed by the U.N. Forces. Unfortunately, breakdowns in production at the Factory Satellite caused a gradual decrease in operational units. Operational rates were reduced such that by the 2030s the Queadluun-Rau could not be supported by available spare parts. Fortunately, support for reproduction of the Queadluun-Rau remained strong. In 2035, variable fighter design and manufacturing company General Galaxy was entrusted by the U.N. Forces with a modernization and reproduction plan for the Queadluun-Rau. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/queadluun-rau-dyrl.htm

character.name: Nousjadeul-Ger
character.description: Similar in function and armament to the television series version, the Nousjadeul-Ger film version featured a more organic redesign for the movie. The Nousjadeul-Ger was also more visible in the film http://anidb.net/a996 [Macross: Do You Remember Love?] proven by it`s inclusion in three major combat sequences in the first two acts of the film. The film version of the Nousjadeul-Ger is also seen using rifles (in addition to a redesigned mecha pistol) and a barely seen variant featuring a 6-rack missile launcher mounted on the top left thruster is also briefly glimpsed during the initial combat scene. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/nousjadeul-ger-dyrl.htm

character.name: Nupetiet-Vergnitzs
character.description: Nearly identical to the television series version, the Nupetiet-Vergnitzs Class Fleet Command Battleship is featured with a slightly different color scheme in the film http://anidb.net/a996 [Do You Remember Love?]. The other significant difference seen in the film version of the Battleship is a ship-length heavy converging beam cannon similar to the http://anidb.net/ch48996 [Quiltra-Quelamitz] Class Gunboat. The Nupetiet-Vergnitzs main gun activates by lifting the dorsal hull and dropping the ventral hull (nearly opening the entire ship from stem to stern) and thus acts as a collimator for super dimension energy to collect and fire forward. In Space War I, Commander http://anidb.net/ch49046 [Vrlitwhai] used this powerful weapon to blast a large hole through the hull of the Bodol Zer Mobile Fortress, allowing the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] to fly into the ship and attack Gorg Bodolzaa directly.Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/nupetiet-vergnitzs-dyrl.htm

character.name: VE-1 ELINT Seeker
character.description: A faster and much more extensively equipped electronic warfare variable fighter, the VE-1 "ELINT Seeker" saw service later in Space War One as a reconnaissance and ECM/ECCM unit. The unofficial designation "ELINT" stands for ELectronic Signals INTelligence, and refers to intelligence gathering by use of electronic sensors. Built by Shinnakasu Heavy Industry (with subcontractor Bifors), the VE-1 combines the capabilities of the FAST Pack space booster system with extensive electronic warfare hardware. Two CTB-04 conformal propellant/coolant tanks (mounted on the leg/engines), two NR-BP-E3 booster thrusters mounted on the dorsal section and two NR-FS-E3 units mounted on the leg/engines provide plenty of fuel for long-range operations and additional thrust for quick evasion. The customized FAST Packs also house the majority of the unit`s electronic warfare equipment including lateral, multi-directional and omni-directional radar systems. This two-seater variant quickly became a valuable support craft on the battlefield, assisting both fighter and capital ship scale long-range combat operations. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/ve-1-elintseeker-valkyrie.htm

character.name: VT-1 Ostrich
character.description: An unarmed variable fighter, the VT-1 "Ostrich" is the UN Spacy`s first dedicated training Valkyrie. Like the http://anidb.net/ch48788 [VF-1D], the Ostrich is a two-seater variant of the standard VF-1 variable fighter with a smaller, simplified head unit and the capability to mount a customized FAST Pack system for use in space. The Shinnakasu Heavy Industry NP-BP-T1 FAST Pack space booster system offers the VT-1 the increased range and improved thrust typical of the unit, but the packs include no micro-missiles. The Ostrich FAST Packs include oversized dorsal propellant tanks, an additional antenna on the starboard booster pod, a wide-nozzle booster mounted on the tail section and swaps two low-thrust verniers for two additional high-maneuverability vernier thrusters. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/vt-1-ostrich.htm

character.name: Golg Gants Charts
character.description: The Golg Gants Charts heavy attack vehicle is the smallest craft that can be mounted with a warship gun and is designed to be a fast and maneuverable anti-ship unit. Built around the central converging energy beam cannon, the pilot controls both the craft and the main gun from inside the cockpit on the port side of the vessel while a gunner is situated inside the anti-aircraft turret on the starboard side. Possessing a double barrel laser cannon turret and two missile launchers for defense, the Golg Gants Charts must still rely on friendly supporting units to defend against light or medium enemy mecha. Often these ships are utilized in unison with other heavy attack craft and friendly mecha to engage enemy forces with some measure of success. During Space War I the Golg Gants Charts saw only limited use by the Zentradi forces as it was vulnerable to the strong destroid defenses of the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross]. However, the Golg Gants Charts was still feared for it`s great firepower and maneuverability superior to that of any large warship. In one notable battle during Space War I, the Golg Gants Charts attacked the forward destroid forces on the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] directly, allowing supporting heavy attack craft a chance to penetrate the hull of the U.N. Spacy ship and lead the http://anidb.net/ch49049 [Nousjadeul-Ger] battle suit forces inside.Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/golg-gants-charts.htm

character.name: A510
character.description: Eye-catching in scarlet red paint, the two-seat A510 Sports Car is a fast and comfortable personal vehicle often seen in use by the civilian population aboard the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1] during Space War I. After an attack upon the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SFD-1 Macross] by Zentradi forces, http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru] and http://anidb.net/ch7418 [Lynn Minmay] were trapped inside a damaged section of the ship. After they were rescued, http://anidb.net/ch7418 [Minmay] drove off in an A510 Car, driven by her cousin http://anidb.net/ch10513 [Kaifun]. A popular and stylish vehicle, the lasting influence of the A510 can be seen in personal vehicles made in following decades. Most notably, the influence of the A510 can be seen during the late 2030`s and early 2040`s when several different cars and even motorcycles appeared, taking obvious design lineage from this stylish vehicle. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/a510car.htm

character.name: RC-4E Rabbit
character.description: The RC-4E Rabbit is a small spacecraft typically used for reconnaissance and light personnel transport. The Rabbit features two large communication antennae and a large sensor mounted on top of the craft as well as four large thrusters of flight and two landing struts likely responsible for the ships name given the resemblance to a rabbit`s feet. The ship is large enough to carry 4-6 passengers (including flight crew) and some small storage for minor equipment. During an unauthorized pleasure flight around Saturn by http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru] in Space War I, 1st Lieutenant http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Hayase Misa] pursued http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou] in an RC-4E Rabbit to order him back to the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross]. The Zentradi then conducted an operation to capture the two craft and although the Rabbit was initially able to evade, the craft could not outrun the pursuing http://anidb.net/ch49049 [Nousjadeul-Ger] power battle suits over time.Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/rabbit.htm

character.name: Quamzin 03350
character.description: Quamzin is a brilliant but mentally unstable Zentradi commander during Space War I. He appears in the 1984 film http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a Zentradi commander who attacks and critically damages http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker]`s Valkyrie aboard http://anidb.net/ch49046 [Vrlitwhai]`s ship. During the melee, http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker] shoots him in the back, and both die when http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker]`s Valkyrie explodes. (Quamzin is unnamed in the dialogue, but listed in the ending credits and script as "Quamzin 03350").Source: wiki

character.name: Gol Boddole Zer
character.description: Boddole Zer appeared in the movie http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a cyborg Zentradi leader who was fused with a massive combat mobile fortress that had a 120,000 cycle history of space battles. In the movie, Boddole Zer was also in command of a male Zentradi fleet which had been at war with the female Meltlandi for hundreds of thousands of years. He orders the destruction of Earth after his fleet discovers a rebuilt Meltlandi ship on the planet before the beginning of the film. After both the Zentradi and the Meltlandi become "cultured" by an ancient Protoculture song and join the surviving humans, Boddole Zer and his fortress are attacked by the combined forces of both fleets and the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross]. Boddole Zer himself is destroyed by http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru] flying a VF-1 Valkyrie variable fighter at the end of the film.Source: wiki

character.name: Gol Boddole Zer
character.description: The largest "ship class" vessel of the Zentradi forces, the Gol Boddole Zer-Class Mobile Fortress served as the mothership for the Zentradi for 120,000 cycles and in Space War I. Decorated in the familiar green hull of the Zentradi forces, the sprawling Gol Boddole Zer mobile fortress appears almost organic in design, resembling vegetation. At some 600 kilometers in width, the vessel was bristling with weapons and functioned as a mobile port for the Zentradi ships of the line. Most impressive of all, the Gol Boddole Zer mobile fortress featured a powerful main beam gun located in large globe at the bow of the ship. When fired, the beam gun produced a broad beam of energy that could destroy thousands of smaller warships or even a vessel as large as itself with but a single shot. Though the gun could only be fired once (due to damage over the many years of interstellar warfare), Zentradi leader Gol Boddole Zer utilized it to destroy the Meltrandi mobile fortress in the final battle of Space War I. However, http://anidb.net/ch49057 [Boddole Zer]`s victory was achieved only at the cost of destroying thousands of his ships in the line of fire, a decision that ultimately brought about his own demise. Some 1,000 ships of this same class continue to operate in the Milky Way Galaxy at the end of Space War I.Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/gorgbodolzaa-mobilefortress.htm

character.name: Milia 639
character.description: Just as in the original http://anidb.net/a77 [Super Dimension Fortress Macross], Milia is depicted as an ace pilot. Milia is first seen when the Meltrandi breached http://anidb.net/ch49046 [Vrlitwhai]`s http://anidb.net/ch49050 [Nupetiet-Vergnitzs]. As she entered the ship, Milia starts killing every Zentran she sees, and after executing her task, flees with gusto.Milia`s subsequent appearance in the movie is during the battle between the Macross fleet and the Meltrandi. In this battle, Milia entered into Lap Lamiz`s ship with a tailing http://anidb.net/ch10506 [Maximilian Jenius] behind her. She was shot down within the ship. Upon breaching the http://anidb.net/ch49048 [Queadluun-Rau] armor, http://anidb.net/ch10506 [Max] is enamored by Milia (as she is with him) and expresses his awe of the Meltran pilot. Milia and http://anidb.net/ch10506 [Max] are finally seen battling together against http://anidb.net/ch49057 [Boddole Zer] and his fleet, http://anidb.net/ch10506 [Max] having been enlarged to Zentradi size.Source: wiki

character.name: Moruk Lap Lamiz
character.description: The Meltlandi Laplamiz-Class Mobile Fortress was seen only briefly near the end of Space War I. This immense spacecraft, comparable in size to the Zentradi http://anidb.net/ch49058 [Gol Boddole Zer Class Mobile Fortress], served as the mothership for the Laplamiz Meltlandi fleet. As tall as the ship is wide, the Laplamiz mobile fortress appears in the familiar magenta colors of the Meltlandi fleets but the hull appears almost rock-like in design, resembling a multi-tiered mountain range. The Laplamiz class is many times the size of the large Meltlan Flagships and within it`s hull the mothership can berth numerous other craft for fueling and supply. During the final decisive conflict of Space War I, the Laplamiz class led the Meltlandi fleet in battle against the Zentradi Gol Boddole Zer fleet. Though both fleets were evenly matched, http://anidb.net/ch49057 [Gol Boddole Zer] desired victory so greatly, he was willing to destroy many of his own Zentradi ships to defeat the Meltlandi. The http://anidb.net/ch49058 [Zentradi Mobile Fortress] fired it`s massive main beam gun upon the Laplamiz Mobile Fortress, destroying the Meltlandi mothership, a portion of the Meltlandi fleet and thousands of the Zentradi`s own ships. Ultimately, the strategy would prove the downfall of http://anidb.net/ch49057 [Gol Boddole Zer].Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/laplamiz-mobilefortress.htm

character.name: Meltlan Gunboat
character.description: The medium-sized, gunboat-class is a famous Meltlandi vessel that was commanded by the ever more famous http://anidb.net/ch49062 [Milia 639] during Space War I. The two large-sized engines provide the gunboat with such high maneuverability and acceleration the ship can achieve the same capabilities as a space fighter. An excellent battleship, the gunboat boasts a potent high-output, short-range guided converging beam gun built as the bow of the ship. When preparing to fire, the bow of the gunboat separates laterally, gathers energy between the two forward booms and releases a very destructive blast at an enemy target. The gunboat class is suitable for a myriad of operation roles including search, reconnaissance, raids upon enemy bases or special missions. Like it`s counterpart vessel the http://anidb.net/ch48996 [Quiltra-Quelamitz] in the male Zentradi fleets, the gunboat is also well equipped for atmospheric maneuvering. Since it is operated by female Meltlandi, the ship carries a complement of http://anidb.net/ch49048 [Queadluun-Rau] mecha. The Meltlandi sent a gunboat to Earth to intercept and destroy the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] upon its return. With a devastating blast from the powerful main gun, the Meltlan gunboat destroyed the top hull booms on the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1]`s own main gun, causing the massive vessel to crash. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/Meltran-gunboat.htm

character.name: Meltlan Flagship
character.description: A large vessel some four thousand meters long, the Meltlan Flagship is a heavily armed fleet command warship for the female Meltlan forces. As large as the Zentradi http://anidb.net/ch49050 [Nupetiet-Vergnitzs] battleship but less massive, the Meltlan Flagship is a medium scale vessel that commands smaller fleet branches within any Meltlan main fleet. Like its Zentradi counterpart, the Meltlan Flagship is armed with many weapons, numerous mecha, and is the largest conventional warship in the Meltlan forces, eclipsed only by the Lap Lamiz Mobile Fortress. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/Meltran-flagship.htm

character.name: Meltlan LST
character.description: A long ship at some 3,000 meters, the Meltlan LST (Landing Ship Tank) is the capital ship carrier vessel for the Meltlandi war machine. The Meltlan LST, like it`s Zentradi counterpart the http://anidb.net/ch48779 [Quiltra-Queleual] Class, is a planetary assault ship that carries troops, vehicles and mecha for planet-side operations. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-lst.htm

character.name: Meltlan Destroyer
character.description: The Meltlan Destroyer is another sleek medium-scale warship with a prominently narrow and vertically structured hull. The counterpart to the Zentradi http://anidb.net/ch48783 [Thuverl-Salan] vessel, the Meltlan Destroyer is some 2,500 meters long and a primary combat vessel of the Meltlandi fleets. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-destroyer.htm

character.name: Meltlan Battleship
character.description: The Meltran Battleship, like the http://anidb.net/ch49104 [Meltran Destroyer], is a mainstay combat warship of the Meltlandi fleet. Some 2,700 meters in length, the ship is larger and more heavily armed than the destroyer and is most likely used as a command vessel for smaller formations and groups within a larger fleet. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-battleship.htm

character.name: Meltlan Cruiser
character.description: At roughly 2,000 meters in length and over 700 meters high, the Meltlan Cruiser is notable move away from the sleek and lengthy designs typical of the Meltlandi capital ships. Nonetheless, the Meltlan Cruiser is another powerful addition to the female Meltrandi forces and is always part of any Meltlandi fleet. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-cruiser.htm

character.name: Meltlan Picket
character.description: At roughly 300 meters in length, the Meltlan Picket is the smallest Meltlandi ship of the line and possibly the smallest capital ship among either the Meltlandi or Zentradi fleets. The Meltlan Picket acts as a forward line of any Meltlandi fleet to which it is attached, helping to warn accompanying vessels of enemy movements. Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-picket.htm

character.description: http://anidb.net/ch49062 [Milia]`s adjutant.
